This RMD file contains the orginial data, and how it was modified to support our use cases.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
real_estate <- read_csv("realtor-data.csv")
class(real_estate)
real_estate$prev_sold_date <- NULL
real_estate$brokered_by <- NULL
real_estate$status <- NULL
real_estate <- na.omit(real_estate)
real_estate <- distinct(real_estate)
real_estate <- real_estate |> 
  filter(price > 80000) |> 
  filter(!state %in% c("Guam", "Puerto Rico", "Virgin Islands", "District of Columbia"))
real_estate |> 
  group_by(state) |> 
  summarise()
  
```

```{r}
write.csv(real_estate, "realestatedata.csv")
zip("zipped_data", "realestatedata.csv")
```
